member.name: M:Blobject.AmazonS3.AmazonS3BlobClient.#ctor(Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Blobject.AmazonS3.AmazonS3BlobClient.ListBuckets(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: List buckets available on the server.

member.name: T:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings
member.summary: Settings when using AWS S3 for storage.

member.name: P:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.Endpoint
member.summary: Override the AWS S3 endpoint (if using non-Amazon storage), otherwise leave null. Use the form http://localhost:8000/

member.name: P:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.Ssl
member.summary: Enable or disable SSL (only if using non-Amazon storage).

member.name: P:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.AwsRegion
member.summary: AWS region, generated and used internally by the library.

member.name: P:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.BaseUrl
member.summary: Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.

member.name: P:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.HasCredentials
member.summary: Check if credentials are configured. Returns true if both AccessKey and SecretKey are non-null and non-empty.

member.name: M:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Access key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

member.name: M:Blobject.AmazonS3.AwsSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Override the AWS S3 endpoint (if using non-Amazon storage). Use the form http://localhost:8000/.
Access key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Secret key with which to access AWS S3. Leave null for anonymous access.
Bucket in which to store BLOBs.

Base URL to use for objects, i.e. https://[bucketname].s3.[regionname].amazonaws.com/. For non-S3 endpoints, use {bucket} and {key} to indicate where these values should be inserted, i.e. http://{bucket}.[hostname]:[port]/{key} or https://[hostname]:[port]/{bucket}/key.
